trans-unit.target: Reason for enlistment: I was inspired by your countless deeds of heroism.
Reason for enlistment: To serve both my Grand Company and my fellow Eorzeans as bravely as you do.
Reason for enlistment: To challenge the limits of my abilities as you challenge yours.
Reason for enlistment: I wish to emulate your calm and resourcefulness in the face of chaos.
Reason for enlistment: I wish to serve under an officer whose hands can create as well as destroy.
Reason for enlistment: I would follow a commander who appreciates the blessings of nature.
Reason for enlistment: I wish to serve under an officer who can balance work and play.
